columns.text:
Jacuzzi Suite (40 sq.m) with balcony (10 sq.m) + Up to 3 guests + Lower level in hotel’s main building + King size bed + Bathroom with couple-sized rain shower.

On the lower level of the complex, Harmony Suite is where Black and Silver colors are harmonically combined, creating a theatrical scenery giving you the feeling that you are entering an actress’s boudoir back in the twenties.‎ The spacious living room leads to a bedroom with a queen size bed and to the black-silver colored bathroom which is all tiled with black marble pebbles.‎  ‎

The outdoor private heated Jacuzzi is waiting to offer you hours of relaxation.‎ Take a nap under the dome on the velvet sofa in the living room and spend relaxing hours in your balcony, enjoying the stunning view to the sea, Oia village and Thirassia Island.‎
Up to 3 Guests/ Caldera View

sizes: col-md-12 p-0 three-col px-3 px-sm-0 animation--up
